post.body: That's why as part of the welcome, employees should be fitted with bells built into their badges.
You should email Steve Jobs....that bookmarking idea is fan-freakin'-tastic!
that is a tease...but a good one! "New Song on the 17th" is like a monthly holiday.
Ha...I just feel bad for the kids. Gee, 'rents, thanks for making me an outcast already. Could've done that myself...
I can't say yet...'cause it's more of a Christmas wish than an actual gift. :)
Right on!
lol, well, good to know. Hi! :)
No idea... but YAY for 5pm!
Aww, sick before Christmas? Suuuuuucks! Hope he feels better!
LMAO! Someone did a vid with Barbie Girl and a bunch of Carrie Underwood pics. Sorry, but that's freakin' funny.
Ha, State Sen. thinks we should allow liquour sales on Sunday to boost taxes. Um, How bout 'cause it's the 21st century? Just sayin'...
I feel like...dancing! Yeah!
70 degrees @ 6pm...wtf?
Christmas is the time of year when i blast Mariah...ha
Need to hear some good live music...hmm, who is playing at eddies attic?
rumination of the day: I bet Bush is glad he didn't invade Holland....Those wooden shoes really would have hurt.
Grr, I still can't get my tweets to appear in Wordpress. Perhaps, I should research that...later.
the one thing I want for Christmas is something no one can buy...will I get it?
Perez is an idiot...except when he gives me some KC news. Can't hate him then. I'm so easy...
ok, seriously, who names their kid Adolf Hitler?
*thinking good thoughts* I need a vacation....wishin' and hopin' it happens ASAP.
...either that, or I need more sleep?
I've been in the South too long: Read headline about SEC failures and thought, "Wha? One of our teams is playing in the BCS championship!"
this stupid back pain isn't going away...and it's quite annoying.
Joss Stone is sorta underrated...
Like Gretchen said, I'm here for the party...
Gettin' ready to go shopping...I must be a masochist, huh?
I wanna horse...
Playing catch up with Reba. Merry Christmas, y'all!
Christmas EVE...and i wanna dance!
gettin' ready for a visit to the Hellmouth...aka grocery store to gather supplies before I turn into Rachel Ray/Paula Deen. Xmas Eve Eve! :)
Wow..hallucinations. Why would a celebrity be here?
I am freeeeee! I am freeeeee!
It's just too cold...
The day before vacation and I wake up with a scratchy throat? Like, seriously???
New 98 degrees cd for $1. Ouch...
Shirtless boys...meh.
Sing along...she's gonna feel that fire...
Freakin friday in action...
and again, one hiccup...what IS that?
